# `FormMessage` Definition

Form message with title, subtitle, and optional image

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | `string` | Yes | Title of the message |
| subtitle | `string` | No | Subtitle of the message |
| imageUrl | `string` | No | URL of the image to display |
